name: Friend or Foe (itch)
description:
We all love horoscopes - mostly for those moments when you're like "WAIT, THAT'S ACTUALLY ME!" This game, Friend or Foe, will judge potential friendships between two strangers on a small scale of 

"S T R A N G E R  D A N G E R" 

and "Friend!" There are three possible endings, so have fun! Will you take all the candy you want ? Or do you dare to share?

Player 1 will use W, A, D

Player 2 will use Up Arrow, Left Arrow, Right Arrow

Players are able to jump twice
